scripts.test.ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive test -u exports -R tap >> tape.tap && istanbul report clover
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive test -u exports -R spec
scripts.coverage-start: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test --recursive -- -u exports -R spec && start coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.lint.ci: eslint --env node --env mocha -f checkstyle lib test > checkstyle-result.xml || echo
